testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user could switch between currencies in homepage
testcase.system-out: Given user go to home page..................................................passed And user select Euro from currency dropdown menu............................passed Then products prices should be displayed in Euro............................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could search for any product
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: And user clicks on search field.............................................passed And user enters "Apple MacBook" in the search text field....................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could search for any product
testcase.name: user could search for product using sku
testcase.system-out: And user clicks on search field.............................................passed And user enters "AP_MBP_13" in the search text field........................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_Hover | user could hover and select categories
testcase.name: user can hover and select categories in homepage
testcase.system-out: When user hovers over the categories and select a category or sub-category..passed And user clicks on category or sub-category.................................passed Then user directed to the selected category page............................passed
